column53: While you wear this cloak, it projects an Illusion that makes you appear to be standing in a place near your actual Location, causing any creature to have disadvantage on Attack rolls against you. If you take damage, the property ceases to function until the start of your next turn. This property is suppressed while you are Incapacitated, Restrained, or otherwise unable to move.

column3: Right click and 'Insert note' to add details on any box.

column18: Fabled for being nearly a legendary
dragon rider pair, Marquess Iddrom, first
of his name, and Marchioness Aise, first of
her name were elevated to their station
and anointed to house Equirrion.
Along with their new station came the
March of Dragonsgrace, covered in open
plains and mountainous regions perfect
for racing. Keeping the secrets to their
technique within the family and branch
houses for generations.
House Equirrion usually keeps it's progeny
very closely related to dragons, more often
then not, arranging marriages between
column30: their sons and daughters with dragons.

column18: More often then not, the marriages will
column30: be between a dragon and their rider.

column18: ALLIES & ORGANIZATIONS
Born to the current Marquess and Marchioness and heir to the March of Dragonsgrace
Mraess, or commonly referred to as Rae by fanily never really cared much for the courtly life.
Instead always slipping out after some accident to explore their mountainous city of Dragonsreach.
As a child Mraess has always shown an affinity for fire and it's more energetic counterpart;
lightning. Born to a full blue mother and a half-gold father, Rae has always been an oddity in
a court filled with half-dragons and dragons. Her vibrant blond almost golden hair constantly
catching sunrays making it appear her hair was sometimes on fire. Completely opposite to her
deep blue and ocean scales of her tail.
Despite her ranking, and her lack of decorum when alone, or with her ladies in waiting, Rae
could wrap courtiers around her fingers, a fact that her mother was always proud of.
Standing up for order and justice, she isn't saddistic as one would expect from someone related to
a chromatic, in fact, she can be rather sweet and charming when she wants to be.
Along with her ranking, comes a love for fashion and always being up to date with the - see note
CHARACTER BACKSTORY
